quote: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.   – Wayne Dyer
fact: In every episode of Seinfeld there is a Superman somewhere.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Astronomers got tired watching the moon go around the earth for 24 hours. They decided to call it a day.
